QuestData.Title: Vul'gath's End
QuestData.Description: Vul'gath's time has come to an end, $n. My daughter's blood is upon his hands, now his blood will be on ours!$b$bShow no mercy and strike him down!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Takes his pet "Gutgore" with him everywhere.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill General Vul'gath within Agurak's Fall.
